alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 1:49PM PST until December 30 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches on the mountains of the Nevada National Security Site. * WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County. * WHEN...From 7 AM Wednesday to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
